newsitem.title: USA: AFTER THE BELL - Cymer leaps on split.
newsitem.headline: AFTER THE BELL - Cymer leaps on split.

text.p: Shares of Cymer Inc leaped after the bell Thursday to 80-1/4 from its close of 77-9/16, following news of a two-for-one stock split by the company.
The producer of excimer laser illumination sources announced the stock split after the close.

Shares in Informix Corp fell to 9-1/4 from a close of 10-5/16 after the California company released a slew of bad news, including a second quarter loss, the restatement of 1996 results and an expected third quarter restructuring charge.

America Online Inc rose slightly from a 71 close to trade at 71-3/8. The company reported a fourth quarter loss of $0.12 per share, including "timing adjustments" made after talks with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
Before the adjustments, fourth quarter earnings for the Internet online service company were $0.09 a share, above the $0.07 estimate listed by First Call.
The New York Stock Exchange said session one had volume of 1,600, compared with 28,500 Wednesday and session two had 637,800, compared with 4.0 million Wednesday.
